betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Harnessing Paradoxical Matter
Every time Paradoxical Matter is used to detonate a rift, there is a chance to obtain Primal Pearls with durability ranging from 1 to 4.

Primordial Pearls
These rare and powerful items are essential components in crafting many advanced thaumaturgical devices. Their versatility and unique properties make them invaluable in a thaumaturge's arsenal.

Applications:
Used in the creation of potent and practical tools or constructs.
Integral to building the Transdimensional Gateway, also known as the Outer Lands Portal.
Dimensional Key - Primordial Energetic Cell
One of the most critical uses for a Primal Pearl is in crafting the Primal Energetic Cell, a device that serves as the key to the Outer Lands (Void Realm). This device allows thaumaturges to venture into dimensions beyond comprehension, unlocking unparalleled knowledge and resources.

Tip: Be cautious when managing rifts, as excessive instability can lead to catastrophic consequences.
